scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate; bundle exec rake db:seed

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The administrator's email address for signing in.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The administrator's password for signing in.

DOMAIN_NAME.description: Required for sending mail. Give an app name or use a custom domain.

RAILS_ENV.description: The Rails environment name to start up in, probably "production".

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: An auto-generated secret key for authentication.

SMTP_AUTHENTICATION.description: Action Mailer authentication, one of plain, login, or cram_md5.

SMTP_OPENSSL_VERIFY_MODE.description: Defines whether Action Mailer should check the certificate: none, peer, client_once, or fail_if_no_peer_cert

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: Password for the outgoing email account

SMTP_PORT.description: Port for the outgoing email server

SMTP_STARTTLS.description: Whether to use STARTTLS for email encryption

SMTP_USERNAME.description: Email username for the outgoing email account
